name: Sonata Mistica
description:
This is a demo request to complete both the subjects of Animation Principles and Videogame Design I.

I spent some extra time after I submitted it to make it presentable enough so you could enjoy it.

I'm eager to read any thoughts you had to share in the comment section!

If you would like to see more, you can also find it here:

https://www.artstation.com/juanjo6

https://app.roll20.net/users/7634306/juan-jose-r

https://www.instagram.com/juanjoseis/
